name: Secret Agent Redemption
description:
Play as Secret Agent Redemption and win the battle against the mafia in this adventure simulator game. Kill mafia gangsters with all kind of guns for rescue missions. Mafia men are highly equipped with guns, seek revenge form gangsters and criminals in this mafia game. Experience stealth mission, spying and fight with mafia criminal rivals. Your duty is to protect your city and rescue hostage citizens from mafia criminal gods. Eliminate deadly mafia mobsters from the ​city and become the best secret agent in this mafia game. Find all the mafia mobsters to clear the city in this secret agent redemption mafia game. Mafia gangsters are all over in the, be careful in stealth mission to save hostages in rescue escape mission. Get hold of the situation, your real challenge is to assassinate multiple gangsters at the same time. Life-threatening crime in your city won’t stop unless you kill them all. Be careful while entering the underworld mafia zone in the action-packed game to experience antiterrorist fight. Counterattack on mafia gangsters to get your revenge in this gang fight Secret Agent Redemption Mafia Game.

Play as a secret agent and clear city from crime and mafia attacks. Agent arriving in a taxi where a thug confronts him wanted his money, beat the thug. The agent got a report of meeting takes place of mafia gangs. He drives the car and follows the mafia underworld boss where they talk about the weapons deal. Secret Agent got the location of weapons deals in the city. His revenge mission starts he need to ruin this deal and destroy all the weapons in the secret agent redemption mafia game. There are different bosses in the areas who are taken a bribe from restaurant kill them both on a tactical mission. Now the whole city mafia is behind you have to survive safely in this Secret Agent Redemption survival game. Now in Secret Agent Redemption mafia leader is on the island go to his mansion and destroy his plans, Kill security guards wings go to mafia leader and kill him in this mafia game. Secret Agent Redemption takes you to the mission filled journey of a spy to go undercover and beat the bad. Download now and enjoy this Secret Agent Redemption with complete non-stop action of Mafia Game 3D.

Game Features
Smooth and Intuitive Controls
Thrilling and Challenging Levels
8 Exhilarating & Exciting Missions
High-Quality 3D City Environments
Use Punch & Powers to Destroy Rivals
Fight with Mafia Gangsters Wings in Town
